parameters.name: ActivationId
parameters.description: The ID of the activation code.

parameters.name: MaxResults
parameters.description:
The maximum number of entries per page.

Valid values: 1 to 50.

Default value: 10.

parameters.name: NextToken
parameters.description: The pagination token that is used in the next request to retrieve a new page of results. You do not need to specify this parameter for the first request. You must specify the token that is obtained from the previous query as the value of NextToken.

parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description:
The page number.

Pages start from page 1.

Default value: 1.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description:
The number of entries per page.

Valid values: 1 to 50.

Default value: 10.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description:
The region ID of the command. Supported regions: China (Qingdao), China (Beijing), China (Zhangjiakou), China (Hohhot), China (Hangzhou), China (Shanghai), China (Shenzhen), China (Heyuan), and China (Hong Kong).

You can call the [DescribeRegions](~~25609~~) operation to query the most recent region list.

parameters.name: ResourceGroupId
parameters.description: The ID of the resource group to which the activation code belongs.

parameters.name: Tag
parameters.description: The tags of the activation code.
